snippet: The United States, which hosted the World Cup in 1994, is expected to eagerly bid for the 2026 tournament.
abstract: FIFA outlines bidding process for 2026 World Cup, including potential expansion of field, joint bids by multiple countries and human rights and environmental sustainability requirements for bidders; host will likely come from North and Central America and Caribbean region, following FIFA's continental rotation system.
lead_paragraph: The United States, which hosted the World Cup in 1994, is expected to eagerly bid for the 2026 tournament.

headline.main: FIFA Announces Bidding Process for 2026 World Cup
headline.print_headline: FIFA Announces Timeline for ’26 World Cup Bidding
